name: E-mail Check Invalid or Disposable Domain_v2
description: Easily check if a certain e-mail address is valid. Is it a valid domain? Is the e-mail a temporary/disposable e-mail? That's a common indicator of spamming/trolling, so now there's an API for you so you can easily block it!

api_methods.name: mailcheck
api_methods.description: Check if e-mail domain is valid, or a disposable/temporary address. Invalid domains (typos, non-responding mailserver, etc) will return "valid: false", "block: true". Disposable e-mail domains will return "valid: true" (since it's a valid domain), but "block: true" and "disposable: true".

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Full e-mail, or domain to check if valid or temporary/disposable. You can enter an e-mail address, and it will be converted to a domain, but entering just the domain is recommended for user privacy reasons.

utterances.utterance: Can you verify if the domain mailinator.com is valid or disposable?
Is the domain temp-mail.org a temporary email provider?
Check if the email address example@10minutemail.com is from a disposable domain.
I need to know if the domain guerrillamail.com is valid or should be blocked.
Is the domain yopmail.com considered a valid email domain?
Please check if the domain maildrop.cc is a temporary email service.
Can you tell me if the domain fakeinbox.com is valid or disposable?
Is the domain trashmail.com a valid domain or should it be blocked?
Verify if the domain getnada.com is a temporary email provider.
Check if the domain moakt.com is valid or a disposable email service.
